name: My Konbini Nightshift
description:
Attention: If the browser version is unplayable on your device due to the lag, there is an alternate download version which runs smooth! About:

A short visual novel set in a 24h opened convenience store. 

Slip into the role of a cashier who has to spend a nightshift by themselves. Take care of the store, manage your finances and keep your customers happy!

This game is mostly story-based with a few point-and-click sections. It was made for a game jam, hence is very short. Don't search for additional endings since there is just one way to finish the game. Just play it having some fun!

You can play through it in about 15 minutes.

Controls:

Use left-click or shift to proceed in dialogues, use the left and right arrows to roll back and forwards and use left-click or the up and down arrows to navigate the menu.

Check "Help" for additional controls!

Content warnings:

crude humour and a bit of violence

Credits:
  • Graphics and writing by Woitsley
  • Free assets: sougetsu-on.net (music), fontna.com (font)
